tipsCard.title: Tips for an ATS-Friendly Resume
tipsCard.description: Follow these best practices to improve your score.
tipsCard.tip1: Use standard fonts like Arial, Calibri, or Times New Roman.
tipsCard.tip2: Avoid using tables, columns, headers, or footers.
tipsCard.tip3: Include keywords from the job description.
tipsCard.tip4: Use standard section headings like 'Work Experience', 'Education', 'Skills'.
tipsCard.tip5: Save and submit your resume as a .pdf or .docx file.
